Header and Footer SectionÂ¶

  1. Header: This section contains the navbar that has the links to other sections of the website.

There are 2 sections within the navbar a) Navbar (Laptop View) :

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To change the logo : Go to file app.js and search navbar-brand, you will see <img> tag where in src you can set the path of the new image.

  • To modify the navbar items : Go to file app.js and search nav-link, you will see <span> tag where you can make changes.

  • To change the link of navbar items : Go to file app.js and search nav-link, you will see <a> tag where in href you can make changes.

  • To append an additional navbar item : Go to file app.js and search nav-item, where you can copy the <li> tag and make the changes accordingly.

  1. Full Screen Navigation (Responsive View) :

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To change the svg image : Go to file app.js and search svg-img, you will see <svg> tag where you can modify it.

  • To modify the navbar items : Go to file app.js and search navigation-content, you will see <a> tag where you can make changes.

  • To change the link of navbar items : Go to file app.js and search navigation-content, you will see <a> tag where in href you can make changes.

  • To append an additional navbar item : Go to file app.js and search navigation-content, where you can copy the <a> tag and make the changes accordingly.

Note

  • You can refer this where you can get different icons according to your requirement and you can copy the html code of that icon and add it into your code and do the further designing.

  1. Footer: The bottom section of a webpage is called as a footer. This area typically contains the name of the company or organization that publishes the website, along with relevant copyright information and some links to their profiles.

If you want to make changes in this section, carry out the following changes in code:

  • To make changes in the heading present in the right section : Go to app.js and search footer-h and footer-p, you will see <h3> and <p> tag where you can make changes accordingly.

  • To change the logo image : Go to file app.js and search footer-logo in the dats-src change the link to a different image. You can add new image in the ../assets/Images/logo/image_name and then add the link to it.

  • To change the last line of the footer : Go to file app.js and search footer-h3, you will see <h3> tag where you can make changes.

  • To change the link of the profiles : Go to file app.js and search social-media, you will see <a> tag where in href you can add the link.

  • To add any other profiles : Go to file app.js and search social-media, you will see <a> tag where you can add the html code of the image and the link to the profiles.

  • To add or change the wave animation : Go to file app.js and search waves, you will see <div> tag where you can add the svg of the animation.

Note

  • There is a button on the right of the footer which redirects to the top of the page.

  • To change the theme of the website, you can toggle the button which is present in the right side of the navbar.
